text: The principle of span of control stipulates that?

options.A: The number of employees reporting to one superior should be kept to a workable maximum
options.B: An employee should report to only one superior
options.C: Managers must demand accountability from their subordinates
options.D: Resources have to be economized within the various divisions

explanation: Span of control" refers to the number of individuals under the supervision of a manager. It defines the maximum number of subordinates that can be put under the authority of one executive.

text: The type of communication from a superior to a subordinate in an organization is referred to as
explanation:
Downward communication in an organization occurs when information and messages flow down through a formal chain of command or hierarchical structure.
This means that messages and instructions start at the upper levels of the organizational hierarchy and move down toward the bottom levels.

text: The excess of the assets over the liabilities of a business is called
explanation:
When you subtract liabilities from assets what we have left is the Net Assets. It is also called equity or net worth or capital, or shareholders equity.
An asset is something owned either cash or something that could be sold or collected to turn into cash, like equipment or a receivable.

explanation:
Extractive industries are those involved in the extraction of raw materials from the earth to be used by consumers.

text: A person who buys new issues with a view of reselling at a higher price in the near future is referred to as a
explanation: A bull market is the condition of a financial market in which prices are rising or are expected to rise. A trader in the stock exchange market who buys stocks with the hope of selling them at a higher price is called a bull.

text: The primary memory component of a computer is the
explanation: A cache is a temporal data storage in a computer's main memory. It makes up part of a computer main memory.

text: The transmission of the telephone services from one country to another is facilitated by
explanation:
A communication satellite creates a communication channel between a source transmitter and a receiver at different locations on Earth. It is the technology behind the transmission of telephone services that are put across various parts of the world.
It relays and amplifies radio telecommunication signals via a transponder

text: The best mode of ensuring that items posted get to the named addresses is through
explanation:
Registered mail is a mail service that allows the sender of a mail to get an electronic verification about the package being sent or that a delivery attempt was made.
The sender gets a receipt when the item is mailed, and the receiver must sign to confirm that it was indeed received.
It is one of the most secure ways of sending packages
With the registered mail, you are required to make a trip to the Post Office to drop off your package. This means you cannot deposit your package in a collection box.

options.B: non-residents of a country travel to other countries

explanation: Inbound tourism is the act of someone traveling to a country other than that where they live for the purpose of tourism.

explanation:
A del credere agency is a type of principal-agent relationship wherein the del credere (agent) for an extra commission, acts not only as a salesperson, or broker, for the principal, but also as a guarantor of credit extended to the buyer.
The del credere agent stands in as a guarantor for the buyer who is buying the goods on credit, and in return, gets paid an extra commission by the buyer

text: Hire purchase is advantageous to the seller in that

options.D: it enhances high level of patronage

explanation: To the seller, a hire purchase would mean more people who are unable to pay for a product in full being able to get access to the product while paying on installment. A hire purchase benefits the seller in the sense that the level of patronage increases as more people will be willing to buy and pay in bits for a specified period of time.

text: A form of money with face value which is greater than the value of the metal contents is
explanation: Token money is the type of money where the face value of notes or coins is unrelated to the value of the material of which they are composed.

explanation:
A proforma invoice is a preliminary bill or estimated invoice which is sent to a buyer by the seller, requesting payment from the committed buyer for goods or services before they are supplied.
When a seller deals with a particular buyer repeatedly, over time, the seller may not necessarily need to send the proforma invoice for the transaction to take place.
